name: TOPFLITE ACADEMY OF AVIATION, INC.
about: Topflite Academy of Aviation, Inc. is a leading flight training institution in the Philippines, founded by seasoned aviation professionals dedicated to elevating industry standards. Located at the Bicol International Airport near Legazpi City, Albay, and with a head office in Pasay City, the academy offers a range of aviation courses, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Flight Instructor programs. Certified by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP), Topflite Academy utilizes class-leading equipment and a curriculum designed by industry experts to provide comprehensive training. The academy aims to mold the next generation of competent and skilled airmen, ensuring students receive an excellent start in their flying careers. With a focus on safety, advanced techniques, and effective teaching methods, Topflite Academy is committed to producing world-class aviators.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Instrument Rating
Flight Instructor"]
